name: Projection:Delayed
description:
Projection:Delayed - A little game about you and another you, but slower in the head. 

Created under 3 hours for trijam-82. The theme was 'delay'.

IMPORTANT: This game has a bug. Sometimes your projection will spawn in the middle of the room, and not inside you. I have no idea why it's happening. I tried to fix it after 3 hours, but nothing helps. It seems like it is just random. Press 'R' to restart the level, If this bug ruins your experience. 

Also, sorry for my terrible English. It's my second language and I was stressed out during the creation of the game... 

Anyway, this game took me about 8 hours to make, including coming up with ideas, eating, going for a walk, compiling, looking for music, and fixing this stupid bug. Hope you enjoy my game at least a little.

Play in full screen for better experience.

Here are the tools I used:

  • Unity 2019.4 (well, yeah...)
  • Blender 2.82 (levels)
  • JetBrains Rider (c# IDE)

And the assets I used:

  • "Mystical Theme" by Alexandr Zhelanov, (link, CC-BY 3.0)
  • "Dark Fallout" by remaxim, (link, CC-BY-SA 3.0)
  • "Water Temple" by el-corleo, (link, CC-BY 3.0)
  • "Winter feeling" by Tom Peter, (link, CC-BY-SA 3.0)
  • Sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

When I started developing this game I could not believe that it's possible. 3 hours is like nothing for 3d puzzle game. I spend some time just looking up for the tutorials I may need before the start. I even tried to guess which bugs can I accidentally make... After this, I took a 2 hours rush, and then finish the game with 3 little breaks. This. Was. Insane.
